Uses of Class
org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDFontDescriptor

Packages that use PDFontDescriptor
org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font Classes to deal with font functionality in a PDF Document. 
 

Uses of PDFontDescriptor in org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font
 

Subclasses of PDFontDescriptor in org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font
 class PDFontDescriptorAFM
          This class represents the font descriptor when the font information is coming from an AFM file.
 class PDFontDescriptorDictionary
          This class represents an implementation to the font descriptor that gets its information from a COS Dictionary.
 

Methods in org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font that return PDFontDescriptor
 PDFontDescriptor PDFont.getFontDescriptor()
          This will get the font descriptor for this font.
